title: Profit Table Response
description: Response for profit_table request, containing account profit table

count.description: Number of transactions returned in this call

contract_type.description: [Optional] The contract type for the transaction if description is set to 1.

deal_cancellation_duration.description: [Optional] Duration set for deal cancellation for Multiplier contracts in synthetic indices if description is set to 1.

duration_type.description: [Optional] The duration type of the contract if description is set to 1.

growth_rate.description: [Optional] The growth rate for Accumulators contract if description is set to 1.

longcode.description: [Optional] The description of contract purchased if description is set to 1

multiplier.description: [Optional] The multiplier for Multiplier contracts if description is set to 1.

purchase_time.description: Epoch purchase time of the transaction

sell_price.description: The price the contract sold for.

sell_time.description: Epoch sell time of the transaction

shortcode.description: [Optional] Compact description of the contract purchased if description is set to 1

transaction_id.description: The transaction Identifier. Every contract (buy or sell) and every payment has a unique transaction identifier.

underlying_symbol.description: [Optional] Symbol code if description is set to 1

msg_type.description: Action name of the request made.

req_id.description: Optional field sent in request to map to response, present only when request contains `req_id`.
